title: No power cuts during morning for two days: PUCSL
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Public Utilities Commission pf Sri Lanka (PUCSL) says that there will be no power cuts from 8 AM until 12 noon for tomorrow (20) and the day after (21).
The commission stated that the Ceylon Electricity Board had granted permission for a two and a half hour power cut within the duration of 12 noon until 10.30 PM on those days.
Following a request made by the Ministry of Education, the Public Utilities Commission stated that the power cuts scheduled for the morning will not take place on 20th and 21st June.
UN coordinator, US Ambassador call for restraint, probe into excessive force
